channel.title: [PI] Degredable items
channel.description:
Hello guys, i really need help so i got the Hybrid Pvp source and it has Chaotic weapons charged and Chaotic weapons uncharged, firstly how can i make it so that when i talk to the barrow fix guy to make him fix uncharged chaotic weapons? And secondly, how can i make like the Chaotic rapier turn into the uncharged version when i got like 100 hits with it or so.
Thanks in advance.
